overview: A war hero returns home following a medical discharge and ends up entangled with a young woman speeding away from her wedding day in her fiance's car. Seeing the soldier, she gives him a ride and explains her predicament. Things get sticky when the cops capture them and accuse the soldier of desertion.
tagline: He Was A One-Man Army - She A One-Girl Blitz!
title: The Man Who Walked Alone
